entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON

SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
